thread.title: Robert Alford picked off Tom Brady and high-stepped all the way to the end zone to give Falcons 21-0 lead
thread.title_full: Robert Alford picked off Tom Brady and high-stepped all the way to the end zone to give Falcons 21-0 lead

author: Harry Lyles Jr.
title: Robert Alford picked off Tom Brady and high-stepped all the way to the end zone to give Falcons 21-0 lead
text: The Patriots and Tom Brady were driving against the Atlanta Falcons, in the middle of the second quarter. The Falcons had been called for three holding penalties on the drive, including one on Robert Alford. Well, Alford made up for it with a pick-six of Tom Brady. Alford went 82 yards, which seemed like a fair trade for the three holds. Tom Brady was understandably dejected: The Falcons now lead 21-0, and will get the ball at halftime. Teams with INT Return TD in Super Bowl are 12-0. — Katie Sharp (@ktsharp) February 6, 2017 In this Storystream
